# ğŸ¤· What is Wrappr?

Wrappr (opens new window) is a legal NFT minter and gallery. It comes with premade legal wrappers (opens new window) for wallets and DAOs. The Wrappr suite also gives attorneys and other drafters the power to plug agreements into NFTs and get paid for their awesome open source work.

Sections in this explainer guide are excerpted from the Paradigm Legal Matrix (opens new window). Please carefully review this guide and linked materials to get the most out of Wrappr.
